original_text: And gave for the service of the house of God of gold five thousand talents and ten thousand drams, and of silver ten thousand talents, and of brass eighteen thousand talents, and one hundred thousand talents of iron.
korean_text: 하나님의 성전 공사를 위하여 금 오천 달란트와 금 만 다릭 은 만 달란트와 놋 만 팔천 달란트와 철 십만 달란트를 드리고

sentences.original_text: And gave for the service of the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 집을 섬기기 위해 주었으니

sentences.original_text: and of silver ten thousand talents
and of brass eighteen thousand talents
and one hundred thousand talents of iron
